instructions:
Salt and pepper meat squares. Alternate pork and veal squares on 6 wooden skewers. Dip in egg and milk
mixture then roll in mixture of cracker crumbs and poultry seasoning. In skillet slowly brown in margarine.
Dissolve bouillon cube in water and pour into Dutch oven. Place the meat on a rack in the Dutch oven, cover
and simmer for an hour.
ingredients: 1 lb. boneless veal shoulder, cut in 1 inch squares
1 lb. boneless pork shoulder, cut in 1 inch squares
name: City Chicken
